title: I can only post to the Help and Support Board. Please help. :/
body: It says I'm level one and won't let me post in any other board saying I have to be level 6. I am level 30. I've been level 30... Heck I even placed silver in ranked last season, what do I do??? :/

replies.body: Ahhhhh sometimes these boards account can get out of sync with your Summoner profile. Typically posting here in H&S will force it to sync back up, which must have done the trick here because you're showing up as level 30 for me right now!
It's working now, just took a few minutes, thank you. ^_^
